examples: She has played with great consistency all season.
Ha jugado con mucha regularidad toda la temporada.
We need to ensure the consistency of service to our customers.
Necesitamos garantizar la coherencia del servicio a nuestros clientes.
Beat the ingredients together to a creamy consistency.
Batir los ingredientes hasta obtener una consistencia cremosa.
The cement should have the consistency of wet sand.
El cemento debe tener la consistencia de arena húmeda.
